results.firPara: In todays Fiver popping candy, Emmanuel Adebayor and Bob Carolgees
results.secPara: In todays Fiver popping candy, Emmanuel Adebayor and Bob Carolgees
results.webTitle: The Fiver | Regan MacNeil levels of severity

results.firPara: Marseilles eagerness to secure reinforcements from the Premier League extends beyond a desire to re-sign the West Ham United forward Dimitri Payet, with the French club having indicated an interest in securing Yohan Cabaye from Crystal Palace.
results.secPara: Marseille are sixth in Ligue 1 but, having been purchased by the American businessman Frank McCourt in October, are seeking to add to Rudi Garcias options this month. The Montpellier midfielder Morgan Sanson was signed this week for £10.3m, while two bids have been submitted, and rejected, for Payet. The second was worth £20m but West Ham would only countenance a sale for a fee of more than £30m for a player who cost £10.7m when prised from Stade Vélodrome only 18 months ago.
results.webTitle: Marseille turn their attentions to Crystal Palace midfielder Yohan Cabaye

results.firPara: Crystal Palaces search for recruits has been frustrated after failing to agree personal terms with the Arsenal full-back Carl Jenkinson following lengthy talks with the player and his representative.
results.secPara: Jenkinson, who has a solitary cap for England gained in 2012, has made only five appearances this season – one in the Premier League – having fallen behind Héctor Bellerín and Gabriel Paulista, and had been keen to revive his career away from the Emirates Stadium. A fee of around £7m was agreed this week, with Arsène Wenger confirming on Thursday the move was basically down to him to find an agreement with Palace.
results.webTitle: Crystal Palace move for Arsenal’s Carl Jenkinson collapses over personal terms

results.firPara: Manchester City have signed Gabriel Jesus for £27m from Palmeiras and the 19-year-old striker is likely to be in the squad for the home game against Tottenham on Saturday.
results.secPara: The Brazilian, who aims to be happy and to make all Manchester City fans happy too, has been training with the club for three weeks while they completed due diligence regarding complications involving third-party ownership of the teenager.
results.webTitle: Gabriel Jesus talks of ambitions after completing move to Manchester City

results.firPara: The Togo striker has been without a club since June but says he is feeling better than ever as he leads his country at the Africa Cup of Nations and would love a Premier League return
results.secPara: A short walk downhill from the Togo teams hotel in Bitam, northern Gabon, a graffiti artist has been at work. Adebayor le meilleur – Adebayor the best – is the scrawl on the side of a breeze-blocked structure, accompanied by a telephone number.
results.webTitle: Emmanuel Adebayor: ‘I have a bad reputation in England and I don’t know why’

results.firPara: West Ham United are in advanced talks to sign Southamptons José Fonte, although Slaven Bilic may have to beat off competition from clubs including West Bromwich Albion to secure the defender.
results.secPara: There has been contact between West Ham and Southampton although it is understood that Fonte, 33, is yet to discuss a move to the London Stadium.
results.webTitle: West Ham in advanced talks to sign Southampton defender José Fonte

results.firPara: Todays fluff just cant work out where the draft is coming from
results.secPara: Todays fluff just cant work out where the draft is coming from
results.webTitle: Football transfer rumours: Bernardo Silva to Manchester United or Real Madrid?

results.firPara: Manchester United have regained the top spot in the Deloitte rich list from Real Madrid with record revenue of £515.3m for the 2015-16 season. Having topped the Football Money League for 11 consecutive seasons, Real posted revenue of £463.8m to slip down to third behind Barcelona, despite winning the Champions League.
results.secPara: Leicester City, the Premier League champions, are one of eight English clubs to feature in the top 20 having generated combined revenues of nearly £2.4bn.
results.webTitle: Manchester United’s record revenue unseats Real Madrid at top of rich list

results.firPara: • Liverpool manager started four teenagers in FA Cup third-round replay
results.secPara: Jürgen Klopp felt that some of his younger players were worried about being embarrassed by lower-league opponents during the first half of Liverpools narrow FA Cup third-round replay victory against Plymouth Argyle, although the German maintained that he picked the right team on a night when Lucas Leiva scored for the first time in more than six years.
results.webTitle: Liverpool’s Jürgen Klopp defends fielding youngsters in Plymouth replay

results.firPara: Steven Gerrard has told Daniel Sturridge to roll up his sleeves and fight for his Anfield future.
results.secPara: The former Liverpool captain watched on at Home Park as the striker endured a disappointing night in the 1-0 win against Plymouth Argyle in the FA Cup third‑round replay before being substituted by the manager, Jürgen Klopp.
results.webTitle: Steven Gerrard tells Daniel Sturridge to fight for his Liverpool future
